paper.title: Functional Extension of Symbolic Model Checking

author.org: Siemens AG, Corporate Laboratories for Information Technology, ZFE IS INF 2

paper.abstract: Burch, Clarke, McMillan, Dill and Hwang describe in [4] a symbolic model checking procedure for Μ-calculus formulas. The algorithm is based on the representation of relations by binary decision diagrams (BDDs) [1]. In the area of synchronous digital circuits a functional instead of a relational representation results in more compact BDDs. This is the reason for extending the Μ-calculus and the symbolic model checking procedure with functions.
